items.sentence: We drink at least three liters of water a day.
I don't know why Tom doesn't want to see Mary.
Why don't we eat while the food is still warm?
Tom won't lend you any of the things you need.
I had no idea that you were so good at French.
You're planning on going tomorrow, aren't you?
You're wondering why Tom did that, aren't you?
You're the one who told Tom and me to do that.
You're going to eventually be able to do that.
I probably should've shown Tom how to do that.
I know Tom wouldn't likely be able to do that.
I can't believe that you did that by yourself.
Tom reprimanded himself for losing his temper.
Tom couldn't speak a word of French back then.
No one from Tom's family attended the wedding.
Tom will be leaving for Boston in a few hours.
According to Tom, we shouldn't have done that.
We hope that you find what you're looking for.
I hope we can get this job done before Monday.
I'll be arriving in Boston tomorrow afternoon.
